MALAYSIA SHORTS

News aggregated and shorten to save your precious time!

  • VANGUARD SAYS THERE'S A 65% CHANCE OF A RECESSION. HERE'S HOW TO PREPARE

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/vanguard-says-theres-65-chance-155559181.html

    68.57% Shortened!

    will drop into a full-blown recession sometime during the next 12 months at 25%, and some time during the next 24 months at 65%

    either is already in a recession or will enter one during the next 12 months

    But many believe it takes more than just negative growth to constitute a recession

    For help understanding what a recession is and how to strategize your investments to navigate a down market, consider working with a trusted financial advisor.  Is a Recession Coming?  Other factors also are part of whether an economy is in a recession

    Even if inflation disappeared tomorrow – dropping to 0% for the rest of the year – the inflation rate for December would be 6.5%

    How to Prepare Your Portfolio for a Recession Stocks already are down this year and would decline even more in a recession as corporate earnings suffer

    Stocks typically drop before a recession and bottom out before the downturn ends

    If you don’t have one, create one with a trustworthy financial advisor

    will experience a recession in the next 24 months

    Tips for Weathering a Recession A financial advisor can help you recession-proof your portfolio, while still growing your money

    If you’re still in the market when a recession hits, consider these five things to invest in during a recession

    ['vanguard', 'recession', 'financial', 'advisor', 'rate']

  • JEFF BEZOS' BET ON HOUSING SLIDE — HIS SINGLE-FAMILY RENTAL PLAY APPEARS WELL-TIMED

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/jeff-bezos-bet-housing-slide-134130180.html

    59.26% Shortened!

    founder Jeff Bezos is taking off

    The stock market has been wildly unpredictable and extremely volatile this year

    Whether it's from the words of Elon Musk or Jerome Powell, the market fluctuates as a result

    may be moving from a housing boom into a housing bust

    Home prices and interest rates are high

    At the same time, the stock market is as volatile as ever, if not floundering, so people are looking for safer options

    Bezos not only made a bet on this being the case last year, but he doubled down on it earlier this year

    If you can’t beat ‘em, join ‘em — Bezos certainly stands to make money off his gamble, but so can the average investor with as little as $100 to invest

    Investing in fractional ownership will not only to diversify your portfolio, but help hedge against a volatile market

    The first of these offerings was fully funded in under 30 minutes Fractional real estate allows investors to use dollar cost averaging and invest through all market cycles, instead of having to time the market and predict the right time to buy

    Benzinga does not provide investment advice

    ['time', 'invest', 'arrive', 'home', 'bezos']

  • LIVERPOOL TEAM VS BRIGHTON PREDICTED AS DIOGO JOTA AND DARWIN NÚÑEZ IN AND LUIS DÍAZ OUT

    https://www.liverpool.com/liverpool-fc-news/features/liverpool-team-brighton-diaz-nunez-25145061

    10/01/2022, 17:32

    70.27% Shortened!

    Liverpool take on Brighton later today as the Premier League returns

    For this one, I'm looking at what is to come

    That means no Henderson but he will play midweek too

    Liverpool will need to go as strong as they can

    Between them, there is no point hurrying back Konaté, so Van Dijk and Matip will get the nod again

    In the rush not to scapegoat Alexander-Arnold, many have inadvertently thrown Elliott under the bus

    The newly-crowned Liverpool Player of the Month for September should not lose his place in midfield — Henderson can play in midweek

    Alongside the youngster, Thiago and Fabinho will complete a strong trio

    Salah is bound to play, and it would be good to get Núñez in the side if he is fit

    In contrast, Salah scored a hat-trick and returned to Liverpool early so he is a must for me

    Diogo Jota is also in form and scored for Portugal while Darwin Núñez did the same for Uruguay in his last international game before returning to Liverpool, and so I would start the trio

    ['liverpool', 'start', 'one', 'salah', 'alexander']

  • HEAPS OF PRAISE FOR RIDERS WHO SPRANG INTO ACTION TO HELP ABDUCTION VICTIM

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/01/heaps-of-praise-for-riders-who-sprang-into-action-to-help-abduction-victim

    10/01/2022, 13:04

    56.0% Shortened!

    "This is the real semangat (spirit) of Keluarga Malaysia where Malaysians help one another without seeing the skin colour," the social media user said

    "Many looked on and went on their merry way but these humble riders did their best to help the poor guy," the user said

    Another social media user said riders were always the first to step in and offer assistance

    It was reported that a 38-year-old businessman was abducted in front of a restaurant in Pandan Indah by a group of men in a white Toyota Vellfire at 5.03pm on Thursday

    Ampang Jaya OCPD Asst Comm Mohamad Farouk Eshak had said the victim had gone to a restaurant alone when he was approached by a group of men

    "He was approached by a group of men who forced him into the Vellfire

    The victim shouted for help to no avail," he said

    However, the victim was later released and went straight to the Ampang Jaya police headquarters at about 10.45pm on Thursday, he said

    He was treated at Hospital Ampang

    ACP Mohamad Farouk thanked the public who tried to assist the victim during the incident

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['user', 'rider', 'go', 'help', 'victim']

    "This is the real semangat (spirit) of Keluarga Malaysia where Malaysians help one another without seeing the skin colour," the social media user said

    "Many looked on and went on their merry way but these humble riders did their best to help the poor guy," the user said

    Another social media user said riders were always the first to step in and offer assistance

    It was reported that a 38-year-old businessman was abducted in front of a restaurant in Pandan Indah by a group of men in a white Toyota Vellfire at 5.03pm on Thursday

    The victim shouted for help to no avail," he said

    However, the victim was later released and went straight to the Ampang Jaya police headquarters at about 10.45pm on Thursday, he said

    He was treated at Hospital Ampang

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

  • LIVERPOOL SHOULD SIGN 24-GOAL FORWARD AS BRAZIL MOMENT PROVES HE IS ROBERTO FIRMINO HEIR

    https://www.liverpool.com/liverpool-fc-news/transfer-news/liverpool-roberto-firmino-goal-brazil-25146530

    10/01/2022, 10:05

    42.11% Shortened!

    Liverpool could have seen a glimpse of a potential replacement for Roberto Firmino in Brazil's latest victory during the last international break

    Sign up to receive the best LFC opinion direct to your inbox We have more newsletters This summer might be the end of an era at Liverpool

    The Kop will be sad to see him depart, though in reality at 31 years old, Liverpool will definitely be saying farewell to Firmino at the right time

    Therefore, should Firmino, who made another 16 goal contributions last season and already six in eight games this season, depart next summer, Liverpool will have to find another player to maintain Jürgen Klopp's depth in attack

    And in order to find him, the Reds may have been given an ideal glimpse at a player who could be the perfect potential replacement for Firmino

    Flamengo's 25-year-old forward, Pedro, is regarded by many as one of the heirs to Firmino's throne in the national team, and it's easy to see why

    The forward has a similar work rate and is blessed with a technical ability that is on par with Firmino

    Sign up to the Liverpool.com newsletter here — it only takes a few seconds! This season, Pedro has already scored 24 goals for Flamengo in 53 games, but just like Firmino, his game doesn't solely rely on goals

    In the most recent international break, Pedro showed a glimpse of his talent for the Brazilian national team, too

    That goal highlighted Pedro's ability to step up and play at a higher level

    He may not just be an ideal heir to Firmino's throne at international level, but perhaps at Anfield, too.

    ['liverpool', 'firmino', 'last', 'newsletter', 'depart']

    Liverpool could have seen a glimpse of a potential replacement for Roberto Firmino in Brazil's latest victory during the last international break

    The forward has a similar work rate and is blessed with a technical ability that is on par with Firmino

  • YOURSAY | GE15 THIS YEAR, COME RAIN OR HIGH WATER

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/637734

    10/01/2022, 09:05

    71.79% Shortened!

    Since when was Umno running the government? They don’t have 112 MPs, do they? Even with PAS, they don’t

    So how can they so brazenly think they can dictate when an election should or should not be held? Yes, the PM is a member of Umno but surely that does not confer any rights for Umno to think they can dictate when an election should or should not be held

    Let’s see how much substance there is to this demand from the Umno supreme council

    Not to a corrupt and bigoted party

    Because your party thinks it can win an election now, you want to put the nation’s lives at risk

    Voter apathy will work against Harapan

    Umno and PAS will play the racial card

    A nation deserves the government it elects

    If the majority want a crooked and corrupt government, so be it

    It is on these grounds that every voter must be ensured one’s right to vote is unobstructed

    I am not one to prioritise a general election over human life and suffering

    ['party', 'umno', 'government', 'election', 'right']

    Not to a corrupt and bigoted party

  • NEW SPONSORSHIP SPURS CHEAM AND GOH TO ADVANCE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/badminton/2022/10/01/new-sponsorship-spurs-cheam-and-goh-to-advance

    10/01/2022, 08:03

    56.0% Shortened!

    June Wei and Jin Wei, who recently signed up with new sponsor Fusionex, marched into the semi-finals of the men and women’s singles events respectively in the Vietnam Open at the Nguyen Du Stadium in Ho Chi Minh yesterday

    It was a memorable day for June Wei as he battled past Taiwan’s Lee Chia-hao 22-20, 25-27, 22-20 in a thrilling 81-minute battle in the quarter-finals to reach only his first semis in four years

    He will take on China’s Sun Feixiang today for a place in the final

    June Wei is determined to keep his focus and reach what will be his first World Tour final since finishing runners-up in the Dutch Open in 2018

    I just want to stay focused and not think too much after this,” said June Wei

    Jin Wei booked her own spot after coming from behind to seal a 9-21, 21-10, 21-7 win over homester Thi Anh Vu

    The 2017 Kuala Lumpur SEA Games champion Jin Wei will take on Thi Phuong Tran of Vietnam next, who defeated S

    Indonesian coach Nova Armada was happy with June Wei and Jin Wei’s good showing and thanked their new sponsor for stepping in

    “June Wei and Jin Wei have received new sponsorship from Fusionex

    June Wei has shown good improvement since then and Jin Wei is also playing well now

    Kisona 21-19, 21-7; Goh Jin Wei bt Vu Thi Anh (Vie) 9-21, 21-10, 21-7

    ['take', 'june', 'wei', 'goh', 'jin']

  • WHAT REALLY HAPPENED IN MALAYSIA’S RECENT ABDUCTION HOAXES? (VIDEO)

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/10/01/what-really-happened-in-malaysias-recent-abduction-hoaxes-video/31005

    10/01/2022, 07:35

    66.67% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 1 — What was initially thought to be a brazen kidnapping attempt outside a school in Ipoh, Perak, later turned out to be a hoax, and has spawned several other claims that have also been debunked by the police

    Malay Mail examines what was claimed in the series of incidents, and the information that were later discovered

    The claim was made in a video showing a white panel van, which went viral shortly after it was posted online

    Some of those resharing the video also claimed children were being abducted purportedly for organ harvesting

    Police also traced the white panel van shown in the video and found it to be a vehicle for worker transport

    Skandaguru also said that the organ harvesting claims date back to 2017 and were being reshared in light of the incident

    The woman who made the claim then apologised

    Johor police chief Datuk Kamarul Zaman Mamat said it was not of any kidnapping attempt, before noting the spike in claims resembling the Ipoh incident

    “For example, it’s okay to say there may be kidnappers out there, keep an eye out for more news and information rather than saying things like ‘there are kidnappers here, be careful, protect your kids’, things like that

    “Google is the best way

    “Also, always be a sceptic

    ['claim', 'police', 'claimed', 'incident', 'say']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 1 — What was initially thought to be a brazen kidnapping attempt outside a school in Ipoh, Perak, later turned out to be a hoax, and has spawned several other claims that have also been debunked by the police

    Malay Mail examines what was claimed in the series of incidents, and the information that were later discovered

    The claim was made in a video showing a white panel van, which went viral shortly after it was posted online

    Some of those resharing the video also claimed children were being abducted purportedly for organ harvesting

    Police also traced the white panel van shown in the video and found it to be a vehicle for worker transport

    Skandaguru also said that the organ harvesting claims date back to 2017 and were being reshared in light of the incident

    The woman who made the claim then apologised

    Johor police chief Datuk Kamarul Zaman Mamat said it was not of any kidnapping attempt, before noting the spike in claims resembling the Ipoh incident

    “For example, it’s okay to say there may be kidnappers out there, keep an eye out for more news and information rather than saying things like ‘there are kidnappers here, be careful, protect your kids’, things like that

    “Google is the best way

    “Also, always be a sceptic

    ['claim', 'police', 'claimed', 'incident', 'say']



  • AH LONG STRIKES THE WRONG TARGET

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/01/ah-long-strikes-the-wrong-target

    10/01/2022, 07:35

    42.11% Shortened!

    Salesman Muhammad Abdul Halim Zaini, who believes that it was the work of loan sharks targeting the former occupants of the vacant house, said all his family members, who live in different parts of the country, had gathered at his mother’s place in Taman Cempaka since Wednesday

    “There was not enough space to park our cars since there were so many of us,” he said, adding that he resorted to parking his sister’s car in front of the house across the road on Thursday night

    He said the house had been unoccupied following the recent death of a woman who lived there

    So I was shocked when I went to the car at around 7am.” Lam Ah Lek, who is the brother of the deceased woman, said his sibling died last month

    But her son, who is in his 40s, did not come back for the funeral, said Lam, who lives nearby too

    We are unable to contact him.” Lam, 67, said loan sharks had splashed paint onto the porch six months ago

    “At that time, a tenant who parked his car in the porch, had red paint all over his car

    “With my sister gone now, the house cannot be put up for rent or sold off as we are worried that the loan sharks would harass those staying in that house,” he said

    Low hoped that police would investigate the matter

    “Lam is afraid that the loan sharks may come back to destroy the house or do something worse,” he said.

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['lam', 'red', 'paint', 'house', 'car']

    Salesman Muhammad Abdul Halim Zaini, who believes that it was the work of loan sharks targeting the former occupants of the vacant house, said all his family members, who live in different parts of the country, had gathered at his mother’s place in Taman Cempaka since Wednesday

    “There was not enough space to park our cars since there were so many of us,” he said, adding that he resorted to parking his sister’s car in front of the house across the road on Thursday night

    He said the house had been unoccupied following the recent death of a woman who lived there

    So I was shocked when I went to the car at around 7am.” Lam Ah Lek, who is the brother of the deceased woman, said his sibling died last month

    But her son, who is in his 40s, did not come back for the funeral, said Lam, who lives nearby too

    We are unable to contact him.” Lam, 67, said loan sharks had splashed paint onto the porch six months ago

    “At that time, a tenant who parked his car in the porch, had red paint all over his car

    “With my sister gone now, the house cannot be put up for rent or sold off as we are worried that the loan sharks would harass those staying in that house,” he said

    Low hoped that police would investigate the matter

    “Lam is afraid that the loan sharks may come back to destroy the house or do something worse,” he said.

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['lam', 'red', 'paint', 'house', 'car']



  • IT'S BYE-BYE, SHAH ALAM STADIUM

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/01/its-bye-bye-shah-alam-stadium

    10/01/2022, 07:35

    50.0% Shortened!

    However, no date has been announced for the demolition of both the Shah Alam Stadium and the Malawati Indoor Stadium and redevelopment of the more than 80ha complex

    Malaysian Resources Corporation Bhd (MRCB) group managing director Imran Salim said existing structures would have to be torn down to resolve the issue of flash floods in the stadium, and a new moveable pitch be built instead

    The new pitch will sit within the stadium bowl with a fixed roof on a raised platform with its own irrigation system, which will negate the use of surface drainage and also enable spectators to be closer to the action on the pitch

    — Bernama However, the proposal does not include a track for athletics events, although open spaces around the complex could accommodate such a track in future

    The stadium can be converted for indoor or outdoor use with a movable pitch, and will be able to accommodate between 35,000 and 45,000 spectators

    Imran said that the multi-use stadium would be football-centric, and aimed to obtain Fifa certification to be an international tournament stadium

    The final specification of the complex will depend on discussions with the Selangor government

    Menteri Besar Incorporated chief executive officer Norita Mohd Sidek said the complex would play a significant role in the economic development of the state

    “The new complex has been identified as having a high economic impact in one of the zones under the First Selangor Plan,” he said

    In July, Selangor Mentri Besar Datuk Seri Amirudin Shari said the project’s cost would be capped at RM787mil through a public-private partnership that would involve the developer being given land in exchange for building the entire complex

    We would love to keep you posted on the latest promotion

    ['shah', 'alam', 'complex', 'stadium', 'say']

    However, no date has been announced for the demolition of both the Shah Alam Stadium and the Malawati Indoor Stadium and redevelopment of the more than 80ha complex

    Malaysian Resources Corporation Bhd (MRCB) group managing director Imran Salim said existing structures would have to be torn down to resolve the issue of flash floods in the stadium, and a new moveable pitch be built instead

    The new pitch will sit within the stadium bowl with a fixed roof on a raised platform with its own irrigation system, which will negate the use of surface drainage and also enable spectators to be closer to the action on the pitch

    — Bernama However, the proposal does not include a track for athletics events, although open spaces around the complex could accommodate such a track in future

    The stadium can be converted for indoor or outdoor use with a movable pitch, and will be able to accommodate between 35,000 and 45,000 spectators

    Imran said that the multi-use stadium would be football-centric, and aimed to obtain Fifa certification to be an international tournament stadium

    The final specification of the complex will depend on discussions with the Selangor government

    Menteri Besar Incorporated chief executive officer Norita Mohd Sidek said the complex would play a significant role in the economic development of the state

    “The new complex has been identified as having a high economic impact in one of the zones under the First Selangor Plan,” he said

    In July, Selangor Mentri Besar Datuk Seri Amirudin Shari said the project’s cost would be capped at RM787mil through a public-private partnership that would involve the developer being given land in exchange for building the entire complex

    We would love to keep you posted on the latest promotion

    ['shah', 'alam', 'complex', 'stadium', 'say']



  • WHAT REALLY HAPPENED IN MALAYSIA’S RECENT ABDUCTION HOAXES?

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/10/01/what-really-happened-in-malaysias-recent-abduction-hoaxes-video/31005

    10/01/2022, 07:35

    66.67% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 1 — What was initially thought to be a brazen kidnapping attempt outside a school in Ipoh, Perak, later turned out to be a hoax, and has spawned several other claims that have also been debunked by the police

    Malay Mail examines what was claimed in the series of incidents, and the information that were later discovered

    The claim was made in a video showing a white panel van, which went viral shortly after it was posted online

    Some of those resharing the video also claimed children were being abducted purportedly for organ harvesting

    Police also traced the white panel van shown in the video and found it to be a vehicle for worker transport

    Skandaguru also said that the organ harvesting claims date back to 2017 and were being reshared in light of the incident

    The woman who made the claim then apologised

    Johor police chief Datuk Kamarul Zaman Mamat said it was not of any kidnapping attempt, before noting the spike in claims resembling the Ipoh incident

    “For example, it’s okay to say there may be kidnappers out there, keep an eye out for more news and information rather than saying things like ‘there are kidnappers here, be careful, protect your kids’, things like that

    “Google is the best way

    “Also, always be a sceptic

    ['claim', 'police', 'claimed', 'incident', 'say']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 1 — What was initially thought to be a brazen kidnapping attempt outside a school in Ipoh, Perak, later turned out to be a hoax, and has spawned several other claims that have also been debunked by the police

    Malay Mail examines what was claimed in the series of incidents, and the information that were later discovered

    The claim was made in a video showing a white panel van, which went viral shortly after it was posted online

    Some of those resharing the video also claimed children were being abducted purportedly for organ harvesting

    Police also traced the white panel van shown in the video and found it to be a vehicle for worker transport

    Skandaguru also said that the organ harvesting claims date back to 2017 and were being reshared in light of the incident

    The woman who made the claim then apologised

    Johor police chief Datuk Kamarul Zaman Mamat said it was not of any kidnapping attempt, before noting the spike in claims resembling the Ipoh incident

    “For example, it’s okay to say there may be kidnappers out there, keep an eye out for more news and information rather than saying things like ‘there are kidnappers here, be careful, protect your kids’, things like that

    “Google is the best way

    “Also, always be a sceptic

    ['claim', 'police', 'claimed', 'incident', 'say']



  • IS THIS THE END FOR BANGKOK'S INFAMOUS NO.8 BUS?

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/10/01/is-this-the-end-for-bangkoks-infamous-no8-bus

    10/01/2022, 07:02

    54.17% Shortened!

    No.8 bus in Bangkok, which is known for overtaking

    Welcome aboard the No.8 bus

    Infamous in the Thai capital, the No.8 route has spawned parody songs, viral TikToks, horrified YouTube videos and even a feature-length Fast & Furious-style film

    “It is a competition,” said driver Aphisak Sodmui, who has helmed his “hot” bus – as the non-airconditioned open-windowed models are known – for the past decade

    The problem, according to Thai transport expert Sumet Ongkittikul, lies with the private firms that lease the route concession from the central Bangkok Mass Transit Authority

    Driver Aphisak supplements his daily wage of between 150 and 200 baht (RM18.50 and RM24.50) with 10% of the daily ticket sales

    “We have to complete the route at least four times a day for us to have enough money to live,” he said

    Passenger Sai Pin, 47, said she had seen a change since the transition to the new buses with a slightly higher fare of 15 baht (RM1.85)

    “With the old buses, you might encounter lots of fast driving

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    Kindly fill the form below We hope you enjoy this feature!

    ['fast', 'passenger', 'bus', 'route', 'driver']

    No.8 bus in Bangkok, which is known for overtaking

    Welcome aboard the No.8 bus

    Infamous in the Thai capital, the No.8 route has spawned parody songs, viral TikToks, horrified YouTube videos and even a feature-length Fast & Furious-style film

    “It is a competition,” said driver Aphisak Sodmui, who has helmed his “hot” bus – as the non-airconditioned open-windowed models are known – for the past decade

    The problem, according to Thai transport expert Sumet Ongkittikul, lies with the private firms that lease the route concession from the central Bangkok Mass Transit Authority

    “We have to complete the route at least four times a day for us to have enough money to live,” he said

    10/01/2022, 07:02

    63.33% Shortened!

    Premier League • England A pundit reckons David Moyes could take the surprise decision to drop Jarrod Bowen amid his struggles in the Premier League recently

    This helped West Ham finish seventh in the league and reach the last four of the Europa Conference League, where they lost to eventual winners Eintracht Frankfurt

    Bowen’s impressive campaign has also seen him become part of the England squad

    Bowen hasn’t hit the ground running this term and is yet to score in the Prem

    While the West Ham ace has seen his form drop off, Rashford and Sancho are looking much better and could therefore get in the England World Cup squad ahead of him

    “West Ham have been very successful and he [Bowen] has been a massive part of that success in winning football matches

    “It’s been a slow start for West Ham this year and most of their players

    Rashford has been in the squad many, many times and Sancho has been in the squad many, many times

    He’s a very talented player but he hasn’t got his Premier League game going yet.” Bowen will certainly be looking to get among the goals when West Ham return to action

    Antonio has proven he is able to lead the line effectively for West Ham, all while being the only striker at the club

    But just like Bowen, Scamacca is yet to score in the Prem

    ['league', 'bowen', 'form', 'west', 'ham']

  • FLEECING WITH MAID FEES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/01/fleecing-with-maid-fees

    10/01/2022, 06:35

    59.26% Shortened!

    National Human Resources Association Malaysia (Pusma) president Zarina Ismail said that although the price cap imposed by the government is reasonable, some agencies may be charging extra for additional services they have to bear

    “Agencies are responsible for the maids they bring in and this responsibility lasts for the entire contract period or until the maid is sent back

    She also noted the extra charges may also be due to the risks which some agencies are taking following the recent memorandum of understanding (MOU) between Malaysia and Indonesia for the sourcing of domestic helpers

    “Some agencies are taking a wait-and-see attitude and are not keen in sourcing Indonesian domestic helpers at the moment,” she said

    She said Indonesian maids who are already in the country and who want to renew their contracts must now get an endorsement from an employment agency

    “There is a risk for the agency endorsing such maids as some may lack proper details under the previous contracts,” she added

    This comes after the price for hiring Indonesian domestic helpers was capped at RM15,000 following the recent MOU between Malaysia and Indonesia

    Julian Tan, a consulting director of an employment agency, acknowledged that some agencies may be charging above the cap price for Indonesian maids

    “Some feel that the profit margin is too low and charge extra for the risks and effort involved in obtaining an Indonesian maid,” he said

    He said that RM17,500 would be a more reasonable sum for agencies to charge employers seeking to hire Indonesian maids

    Tan said he has stopped dealing with Indonesian domestic helpers and has shifted focus to those from the Philippines

    ['indonesian', 'domestic', 'may', 'say', 'agency']

    National Human Resources Association Malaysia (Pusma) president Zarina Ismail said that although the price cap imposed by the government is reasonable, some agencies may be charging extra for additional services they have to bear

    “Agencies are responsible for the maids they bring in and this responsibility lasts for the entire contract period or until the maid is sent back

    She also noted the extra charges may also be due to the risks which some agencies are taking following the recent memorandum of understanding (MOU) between Malaysia and Indonesia for the sourcing of domestic helpers

    “Some agencies are taking a wait-and-see attitude and are not keen in sourcing Indonesian domestic helpers at the moment,” she said

    She said Indonesian maids who are already in the country and who want to renew their contracts must now get an endorsement from an employment agency

    “There is a risk for the agency endorsing such maids as some may lack proper details under the previous contracts,” she added

    This comes after the price for hiring Indonesian domestic helpers was capped at RM15,000 following the recent MOU between Malaysia and Indonesia

    Julian Tan, a consulting director of an employment agency, acknowledged that some agencies may be charging above the cap price for Indonesian maids

    “Some feel that the profit margin is too low and charge extra for the risks and effort involved in obtaining an Indonesian maid,” he said

    He said that RM17,500 would be a more reasonable sum for agencies to charge employers seeking to hire Indonesian maids

    Tan said he has stopped dealing with Indonesian domestic helpers and has shifted focus to those from the Philippines

    ['indonesian', 'domestic', 'may', 'say', 'agency']



  • BIDEN ADMINISTRATION SCALES BACK ELIGIBILITY FOR STUDENT LOAN FORGIVENESS. HERE'S WHO'S AFFECTED

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/biden-administration-scales-back-eligibility-232753805.html

    50.0% Shortened!

    Borrowers with incomes of less than $125,000 (or $250,000 for a couple) can qualify for up to $10,000 in debt forgiveness on their federal direct student loans

    This includes at least some of the loans issued through the Federal Family Education Loan, Federal Perkins Loan and Health Education Assistance Loan programs

    Initially, the administration said that qualified borrowers with these privately held loans could consolidate them into a federal direct loan and obtain debt relief

    On Thursday, however, the department's website said that to receive relief, borrowers had to have applied for a consolidation loan by Sept

    Some FFEL and Perkins loans are held by the Education Department, so they remain eligible for the blanket forgiveness if the borrowers meet the income limits

    To find out whether your FFEL or Perkins loans could qualify for forgiveness, go to your account at the Federal Student Aid site (studentaid.gov) and call up the “My Loan Servicers” list

    If the servicer’s name is preceded by “DEPT OF ED,” that loan is held by the federal government

    More than 5 million of those loans are held by the Education Department

    Of the remaining, privately held but federally guaranteed loans, only a portion of the borrowers would meet the income limits for blanket loan forgiveness

    The change was reported on the same day that six Republican-controlled states sued to block the blanket debt forgiveness, arguing that the administration didn't have the authority to wipe out student loan balances

    By cutting off the ability to qualify for forgiveness by consolidating privately held FFELs, Perkins loans and HEALs into a direct loan, the administration is reducing lenders' and servicing companies' loss of future earnings

    ['federal', 'student', 'loan', 'relief', 'borrower']

    Borrowers with incomes of less than $125,000 (or $250,000 for a couple) can qualify for up to $10,000 in debt forgiveness on their federal direct student loans

    This includes at least some of the loans issued through the Federal Family Education Loan, Federal Perkins Loan and Health Education Assistance Loan programs

    Initially, the administration said that qualified borrowers with these privately held loans could consolidate them into a federal direct loan and obtain debt relief

    On Thursday, however, the department's website said that to receive relief, borrowers had to have applied for a consolidation loan by Sept

    Some FFEL and Perkins loans are held by the Education Department, so they remain eligible for the blanket forgiveness if the borrowers meet the income limits

    To find out whether your FFEL or Perkins loans could qualify for forgiveness, go to your account at the Federal Student Aid site (studentaid.gov) and call up the “My Loan Servicers” list

    If the servicer’s name is preceded by “DEPT OF ED,” that loan is held by the federal government

    More than 5 million of those loans are held by the Education Department

    Of the remaining, privately held but federally guaranteed loans, only a portion of the borrowers would meet the income limits for blanket loan forgiveness

    The change was reported on the same day that six Republican-controlled states sued to block the blanket debt forgiveness, arguing that the administration didn't have the authority to wipe out student loan balances

    By cutting off the ability to qualify for forgiveness by consolidating privately held FFELs, Perkins loans and HEALs into a direct loan, the administration is reducing lenders' and servicing companies' loss of future earnings

    ['federal', 'student', 'loan', 'relief', 'borrower']

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/potential-recession-hanging-over-country-100000209.html

    87.21% Shortened!

    About 3 million people should get the check

    You can check the status of your rebate here)

    Single filers can get up to $250 while people who file as head of household can get a maxim of $375

    You can check the status of your rebate here

    You’re eligible if you filed a resident tax return for 2020 and 2021

    It will see people get a one-time payment of $850 for inflation relief

    To be eligible for the payment, residents must file a tax return by the end of October 2022

    Payments will be issued as a check separate from your tax return

    Two laws were passed in the state providing a rebate and relief payment

    State senators proposed a one-time $200 payment to all licensed drivers in the state

    The Gas Tax Rebate would be funded out of the state’s $1.3 million revenue surplus

  • “I JUST DON’T GET IT” – KLOPP EXASPERATED OVER CRITICISM OF TRENT’S DEFENDING

    https://www.thisisanfield.com/2022/09/i-just-dont-get-it-klopp-exasperated-over-criticism-of-trents-defending/

    10/01/2022, 06:03

    50.0% Shortened!

    Jurgen Klopp has not hidden his frustration over the continued calls that Trent Alexander-Arnold cannot defend throughout the years, and it remains the same after his England omission

    But that’s not how Southgate has seen it and Klopp was respectful in response when asked about Alexander-Arnold’s time with England, but did say from “my point of view, it’s an easy pick.” The stick that the No

    “Trent didn’t do well in these moments as well, but in other moments he defended exceptionally well – but for him and his situation, nobody mentions it

    “He’s an outstanding footballer in a situation where three other right-backs in this country are doing really well, we should not forget that

    “We have the way we play, in our high press very often Trent is the highest of all the three in the back

    “That’s the way we play football, now they say ‘defend better’, you cannot have everything

    “It’s a risk we take, it’s not a crazy risk but in the one moment where we don’t win [the ball], people ask where is Trent? “That’s a question I don’t understand, everyone who watches football that often and that long why would you then say ‘that is his main job?’ – I told him he has to be there [in high press]

    “Every player in the league has these challenges but all the experts [say] ‘this situation you see it is a weakness’

    “Honestly, I just don’t get it

    “If he would not be a good defender he would not play

    “He’s involved in everything, that’s absolutely fine and he is doing well

    ['trent', 'alexander', 'arnold', 'defend', 'england']

  • BAYERN MUNICH VS. BAYER LEVERKUSEN - FOOTBALL MATCH REPORT - SEPTEMBER 30, 2022

    https://www.espn.com/soccer/report?gameId=638507

    10/01/2022, 04:35

    54.17% Shortened!

    Jamal Musiala scored once and set up two more goals as champions Bayern Munich cruised past Bayer Leverkusen 4-0 on Friday to snap a four-game winless run in the Bundesliga

    The Germany international delivered a superb performance for a confidence-boosting win ahead of Tuesday's Champions League group game against Viktoria Plzen and the big Bundesliga match against Borussia Dortmund next weekend

    "Everyone in the team wanted to win today

    Pressure is always there at Bayern." In a frenzied start, Musiala set up Leroy Sane for their first goal in the third minute to settle nerves in the Allianz Arena as the Bavarians were desperate to bounce back following their recent dip in form and their longest run without a win in 20 years

    He then helped Sadio Mane end his five-game goal drought, picking out the Senegalese in the box who sent another deflected effort past goalkeeper Lukas Hradecky for his first goal in front of a home crowd

    Musiala has now scored five times in the league and set up three goals

    The win lifted Bayern into second place in the Bundesliga on 15 points, two behind leaders Union Berlin, who travel to Eintracht Frankfurt on Saturday

    Fellow Champions League club, Bayer Leverkusen, who travel to Porto on Tuesday, slumped deeper into trouble, dropping to 16th in the league

    More Details Jamal Musiala starred as champions Bayern Munich cruised past Bayer Leverkusen 4-0 on Friday to snap a four-game winless run in the Bundesliga

    Jamal Musiala finishes the pass from Thomas Muller to give Bayern Munich a 2-0 lead

    Julian Nagelsmann speaks about his future ahead of Bayern Munich's clash with Bayer Leverkusen

    ['musiala', 'goal', 'bayern', 'leverkusen', 'game']

  • DON'T EVEN THINK ABOUT RETIRING UNTIL YOU HAVE THESE 3 THINGS COMPLETELY PAID OFF — YOUR MORTGAGE ISN'T ONE OF THEM

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/dont-even-think-retiring-until-153000554.html

    66.67% Shortened!

    The interest rate on those loans could surge to 7.54% in the new year

    So all those payments take away from your retirement income

    While these credit card balances should be paid down quickly, you shouldn’t let them delay saving for your retirement

    Instead, consider lowering your mortgage payments to use those funds to pay down other high interest loans

    Finally, auto loans are another area to pay off before retirement

    As of August 2022, the average car loan for a buyer with good credit was 7.88%, according to MyAutoloan

    But if you have bad credit, that soars up to 19.87%

    That’s about as much as the interest rate on a credit card

    What’s more, you’ll have to take into consideration these payments for your retirement

    If $400 goes into a car payment, and $300 to a credit card and more for student loans, suddenly you have far less cash on hand for your retirement

    So why not pay down your mortgage too? It’s not just lower interest rates, although with the average national mortgage rate for a 30-year fixed rate at about 6.5%, that is an advantage

    ['retirement', 'pay', 'loan', 'mortgage', 'interest']

  • THIS IS HOW MUCH A $200,000 ANNUITY WILL SCORE YOU MONTHLY

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/much-does-200-000-annuity-120000015.html

    72.5% Shortened!

    An annuity can be an appealing option to build your retirement nest egg

    But the exact amount that you’ll get from an annuity each month will vary

    What Is an Annuity? An annuity is a financial contract between an investor and an insurance company that generally locks in a regular monthly payout in exchange for an investment

    You can buy an annuity if you want a guaranteed source of income for any situation

    An immediate annuity kicks in right away

    But you’ll typically see a higher monthly payment with a deferred annuity

    If you sign up for a fixed annuity, you’ll lock in guaranteed monthly payments

    If you sign up for a variable annuity, you won’t find guaranteed monthly payments

    Should You Get an Annuity? Depending on your financial circumstances, an annuity could be a reliable stream of income for your retirement

    An annuity sends a monthly payment to you every month

    If you can’t decide whether or not an annuity is right for you then it’s time to talk to a financial advisor

    ['annuity', 'retirement', 'income', 'financial', 'monthly']

    An annuity can be an appealing option to build your retirement nest egg

    But the exact amount that you’ll get from an annuity each month will vary

    What Is an Annuity? An annuity is a financial contract between an investor and an insurance company that generally locks in a regular monthly payout in exchange for an investment

    You can buy an annuity if you want a guaranteed source of income for any situation

    An immediate annuity kicks in right away

    But you’ll typically see a higher monthly payment with a deferred annuity

    If you sign up for a fixed annuity, you’ll lock in guaranteed monthly payments

    If you sign up for a variable annuity, you won’t find guaranteed monthly payments

    Should You Get an Annuity? Depending on your financial circumstances, an annuity could be a reliable stream of income for your retirement

    An annuity sends a monthly payment to you every month

    If you can’t decide whether or not an annuity is right for you then it’s time to talk to a financial advisor

    ['annuity', 'retirement', 'income', 'financial', 'monthly']



  • WHAT DID WARREN BUFFETT SAY HE'D WRITE A $25 BILLION CHECK FOR?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/did-warren-buffett-hed-write-170745580.html

    65.62% Shortened!

    You may even know from his documentary “Becoming Buffett” that his No

    What you may have missed though, was the Oracle of Omaha’s fancy for farmland

    One of Gates’s biggest bets lately has been farmland

    At that same shareholders’ meeting alluded to previously, the example Buffett gave as the anti-Bitcoin was farmland

    for a 1% interest in all the farmland in the United States, pay our group $25 billion, I’ll write you a check this afternoon,” Buffett said during the meeting

    ”[For] $25 billion I now own 1% of the farmland

    That’s bad news if you’re looking to buy a house for yourself but great news if you’re looking for property as an investment

    If you are able to purchase a property outright and on your own, that may be the best option

    But it’s not just Gates or Buffett — even Goldman Sachs sees an opportunity with farmland

    you can use crowdfunding platforms to get the best bang for your buck and rely on experts to help you invest in the most profitable farmland available

    Benzinga does not provide investment advice

    ['buffett', 'farmland', 'investment', 'say', 'gate']

    You may even know from his documentary “Becoming Buffett” that his No

    What you may have missed though, was the Oracle of Omaha’s fancy for farmland

    One of Gates’s biggest bets lately has been farmland

    At that same shareholders’ meeting alluded to previously, the example Buffett gave as the anti-Bitcoin was farmland

    for a 1% interest in all the farmland in the United States, pay our group $25 billion, I’ll write you a check this afternoon,” Buffett said during the meeting

    ”[For] $25 billion I now own 1% of the farmland

    That’s bad news if you’re looking to buy a house for yourself but great news if you’re looking for property as an investment

    If you are able to purchase a property outright and on your own, that may be the best option

  • TOP APPLE EXECUTIVE IS LEAVING AFTER MAKING CRUDE REMARKS IN TIKTOK VIDEO

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/top-apple-executive-leaving-making-185638195.html

    54.17% Shortened!

    (Bloomberg) -- One of Apple Inc.’s most senior executives is leaving after he turned up in a viral video on TikTok making an off-color joke that he fondles “big-breasted women” for a living

    5, Apple’s Tony Blevins was approached by TikTok and Instagram creator Daniel Mac as part of a series where he asks owners of expensive cars their occupations

    He also touted that he has a “hell of a dental plan.” In reality, Blevins is Apple’s vice president of procurement and is in charge of striking deals with suppliers and partners

    Blevins, a 22-year veteran of Apple, confirmed the incident to Bloomberg, saying the encounter took place on Aug

    An Apple spokesman said Thursday that Blevins is departing the Cupertino, California-based company

    Blevins has been part of a roughly 100-person group of vice presidents at Apple and one of only about 30 executives that report to either Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook or Chief Operating Officer Jeff Williams

    Williams has been Blevins’s boss for much of his career, though he briefly reported to Sabih Khan, Apple’s senior vice president of operations, according to the people

    It was Williams’s decision for the company and Blevins to part ways, one of the people said

    The operating chief will oversee Blevins’s old team, at least for now, according to the person

    The TikTok video was taken at a car show that Blevins attended last month in Pebble Beach, California

    Blevins’s departure opens up a void at Apple

    ['apple', 'executive', 'video', 'blevins', 'say']

    (Bloomberg) -- One of Apple Inc.’s most senior executives is leaving after he turned up in a viral video on TikTok making an off-color joke that he fondles “big-breasted women” for a living

    5, Apple’s Tony Blevins was approached by TikTok and Instagram creator Daniel Mac as part of a series where he asks owners of expensive cars their occupations

    He also touted that he has a “hell of a dental plan.” In reality, Blevins is Apple’s vice president of procurement and is in charge of striking deals with suppliers and partners

    Blevins, a 22-year veteran of Apple, confirmed the incident to Bloomberg, saying the encounter took place on Aug

    An Apple spokesman said Thursday that Blevins is departing the Cupertino, California-based company

    Blevins has been part of a roughly 100-person group of vice presidents at Apple and one of only about 30 executives that report to either Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook or Chief Operating Officer Jeff Williams

  • HOUSE DEMOCRATS HAVE OFFICIALLY DRAFTED A BILL THAT BANS POLITICIANS, JUDGES, THEIR SPOUSES AND CHILDREN FROM TRADING STOCKS — BUT HERE'S WHAT THEY'RE STILL ALLOWED TO OWN AND DO

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/house-democrats-officially-drafted-bill-154500661.html

    56.0% Shortened!

    Democrats have introduced legislation that would ban senior government officials from owning and trading stocks

    The bill, called the Combating Financial Conflicts of Interest in Government Act, is an attempt to limit conflict of interest for public office holders and their families when it comes to their investments

    The proposed bill is wide reaching

    And while it doesn’t make them clairvoyant, it’s certainly an advantage when it comes to the market

    Senior officials and others affected by the bill will be required to either sell their holdings when they take their position or put them into a blind trust, where they would have no control over trades

    Critics have been calling for such a bill for years, but the House and Senate have long resisted

    It happened soon before the Senate was expected to vote on a bipartisan bill that would see domestic chipmakers get a $52 billion subsidy

    The bill was passed in July and, amid the scrutiny, Paul Pelosi sold his holdings in the semiconductor manufacturer at a six-figure loss

    But months before that summer scandal, as calls for legislation to combat the issue mounted, Nancy Pelosi directed the House Administration Committee to draft a bill back in February

    The feeling that the well-connected in Congress have a leg up on the market has been growing over the years

    But it may be a while yet before Congress makes a decision on the bill

    ['would', 'senior', 'bill', 'call', 'come']

    Democrats have introduced legislation that would ban senior government officials from owning and trading stocks

    The bill, called the Combating Financial Conflicts of Interest in Government Act, is an attempt to limit conflict of interest for public office holders and their families when it comes to their investments

    The proposed bill is wide reaching

    And while it doesn’t make them clairvoyant, it’s certainly an advantage when it comes to the market

    Senior officials and others affected by the bill will be required to either sell their holdings when they take their position or put them into a blind trust, where they would have no control over trades

    The bill was passed in July and, amid the scrutiny, Paul Pelosi sold his holdings in the semiconductor manufacturer at a six-figure loss

    But months before that summer scandal, as calls for legislation to combat the issue mounted, Nancy Pelosi directed the House Administration Committee to draft a bill back in February

  • HOW MUCH MONEY DO I NEED TO LIVE ENTIRELY OFF DIVIDENDS? HERE IS THE LOWEST AMOUNT YOU CAN PROBABLY GET AWAY WITH

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/much-money-live-entirely-off-182000078.html

    67.65% Shortened!

    But how much money do you realistically need to be able to drop out of the workforce and get by on dividend payouts alone? While you will have to start by honestly assessing what you can live with — and without

    But there’s a simple formula and some less simple risks you’ll need to consider when making the big dividend-dependency decision

    For straight-up equity investors, those cash payouts fuel dividend income — where passively generated payouts cover your living expenses

    How much you’ll need exactly depends on your income, spending habits and living expenses

    But once you know how much you’ll need to live, here’s a simple formula to apply that to sort out how much you need in total

    Next, consider what you can reasonably expect from dividend yields

    It’s fair to plan on yield rates between 1% and 6%

    Dividend payments from a taxable brokerage account, or traditional 401(k) and IRA accounts, are considered taxable income

    If you think you can manage expenses at a median dividend income, then planning is everything

    Handled carefully, the pursuit of steady, sustainable dividend income can be a winning play

    For older Americans, living off dividend income could make sense, especially if it delays taking a Social Security benefit

    ['portfolio', 'income', 'need', 'dividend', 'company']

  • SEEKING AT LEAST 16% DIVIDEND YIELD? THIS TOP ANALYST SUGGESTS 2 DIVIDEND STOCKS TO BUY

    Genco Shipping (GNK) The first company we’ll look at is Genco Shipping, a bulk carrier in the global ocean shipping network

    The company’s last declared dividend, paid out in August, was for 50 cents per common share

    At its current rate, the dividend yields 16.5%, well ahead of the inflation rate

    In Nolan’s view, Genco is a Buy with a target price of $20, implying a one-year upside potential of 65%

    At the current rate, the dividend annualizes to $8.80 and gives a yield of 21%

    The dividend was last paid out in August

    This is another company whose performance – and especially, dividend performance – have caught Nolan’s attention

    The stock has an average price target of $72.40, which indicates ~76% upside potential from the trading price of $41.21

  • JIM CRAMER SAYS BUY THESE 2 HIGH-YIELD DIVIDEND STOCKS — INCLUDING ONE WITH 10% YIELD

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/jim-cramer-says-buy-2-002323365.html

    80.0% Shortened!

    This, in turn, brings Cramer to a specific investment choice -- high-yield dividend stocks

    Drilling down, Devon reported net income of $1.9 billion, or $2.59 per diluted share

    Even better, for investors, was the $2.1 billion in free cash flow reported for 2Q22, a company record for Devon

    This was up 22% from the previous quarter, and the highest single dividend that Devon has ever paid

    Based on the current dividend yield and the expected price appreciation, the stock has ~102% potential total return profile

    This gives the stock a Moderate Buy analyst consensus rating

    (See DVN stock forecast on TipRanks) KeyCorp (KEY) We’ll shift our focus now, as Cramer’s second high-yielding div stock is a Bancorp, KeyCorp, the holding company with ownership of KeyBank

    In the recent second quarter of 2022, the company had total revenue of $1.8 billion, well in the $1.7 billion to $2 billion range it has hit for the past 8 quarters

    This was down from the 72 cents reported in the year-ago quarter, but still solidly profitable – and more than enough to cover the 19.5 cent per common share dividend payment

    Buy) rating, as well as a $29 price target that indicates potential for 79% upside in the next 12 months

    The stock’s average price target of $22.19 gives ~37% upside to the current price of $16.17

    56.0% Shortened!

    Klopp was respectful of Southgate and would not be drawn into discussions about the selections he made for his team, insisting that whatever he said would not help England's chances of being successful at the World Cup finals

    Jurgen Klopp has insisted Trent Alexander-Arnold is 'world class' despite recent form What Klopp could not hold back on, though, was the notion that Alexander-Arnold is somehow deficient in his defensive capabilities and he was incredulous that he would pick the 23-year-old if he was somehow lacking in key qualities to play the position

    While Liverpool's manager did concede that Alexander-Arnold has been below form at times this season - as has been the case for his team in general - the belief he has in a young man who has only been capped 17 times by England could not be higher

    'It helps Germany, maybe, it doesn't help England

    'A manager picks a player, or not, which I would obviously decide differently but I'm not in charge of this team and that's how it is

    Whichever team I would coach in the moment, I would sign him because he is exceptional

    HARRY MAGUIRE has been ruled out of the Manchester derby with a hamstring injury, manager Erik ten Hag has confirmed

    The Man Utd skipper, 29, has been out of favour in recent weeks, with Ten Hag opting to select the pair of Lisandro Martinez and Raphael Varane instead

    And Ten Hag will once again be absolved of the dilemma whether to pick Maguire or not against rivals Man City as he is unavailable for selection

    "Even after he wasn't in the team he trained really well and the quality was there

    "You see his career, for Leicester and Manchester United almost 50 caps for England, performing really well, what you see is high potential

  • U.S. CONSUMER SPENDING REBOUNDS IN AUGUST; INFLATION PICKS UP

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/u-consumer-spending-rebounds-august-124615715.html

    56.0% Shortened!

    Still, inflation picked up last month

    The personal consumption expenditures (PCE) price index rose 0.3% last month after dipping 0.1% in July

    In the 12 months through August, the PCE price index increased 6.2% after advancing 6.4% in July

    Excluding the volatile food and energy components, the PCE price index jumped 0.6% after being unchanged in July

    The so-called core PCE price index climbed 4.9% on a year-on-year basis in August after increasing 4.7% in July

    The Fed tracks the PCE price indexes for its 2% inflation target

    The consumer price index increased 8.3% year-on-year in August

    The Fed raised its median forecast for core PCE inflation to 4.5% this year from its previous estimate of 4.3% in June

    Inflation adjusted consumer spending barely rose in August

    That suggests consumer spending could be tepid this quarter after helping to blunt the drag on gross domestic product from a slow down in the pace of inventory accumulation in the second quarter

    The economy contracted at a 0.6% annualized rate last quarter after shrinking at a 1.6% pace in the January-March quarter

    ['consumer', 'august', 'inflation', 'quarter', 'increase']

    Still, inflation picked up last month

    The personal consumption expenditures (PCE) price index rose 0.3% last month after dipping 0.1% in July

    In the 12 months through August, the PCE price index increased 6.2% after advancing 6.4% in July

    Excluding the volatile food and energy components, the PCE price index jumped 0.6% after being unchanged in July

    The so-called core PCE price index climbed 4.9% on a year-on-year basis in August after increasing 4.7% in July

    The Fed tracks the PCE price indexes for its 2% inflation target

    The consumer price index increased 8.3% year-on-year in August

    The Fed raised its median forecast for core PCE inflation to 4.5% this year from its previous estimate of 4.3% in June

    Inflation adjusted consumer spending barely rose in August

    That suggests consumer spending could be tepid this quarter after helping to blunt the drag on gross domestic product from a slow down in the pace of inventory accumulation in the second quarter

    The economy contracted at a 0.6% annualized rate last quarter after shrinking at a 1.6% pace in the January-March quarter

    ['consumer', 'august', 'inflation', 'quarter', 'increase']



  • BODY OF KIDNAPPED WOMAN FOUND IN RAVINE, MAN ARRESTED

    https://www.thesundaily.my/local/body-of-kidnapped-woman-found-in-ravine-man-arrested-BE9897614

    09/30/2022, 20:34

    42.86% Shortened!

    Negeri Sembilan police chief DCP Ahmad Dzaffir Mohd Yusoff said the 27-year-old woman is believed to have been murdered

    Her remains were found by members of the public at about 3.30 pm

    “Based on the identity card and documents found with her as well as identification by family members, the body found is linked to a kidnapping case,” he said in a statement today

    He said following the discovery of the body, a man in his 20s was arrested in Ampang, Selangor on the same day to assist in the investigation

  • 2 ‘STRONG BUY’ DIVIDEND STOCKS YIELDING AT LEAST 8%

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/2-strong-buy-dividend-stocks-004214179.html

    79.63% Shortened!

    The company had a net income of $1.33 billion, an increase of $700 million year-over-year, or 90%

    For the second quarter of 2022, ET had a DCF of $1.88 billion, up a solid $500 million from the year-ago quarter

    This is the source of the company’s dividend, so the increase is important

    ET set its most recent dividend, for the second quarter of the year, paid out in August at 23 cents per common share

    This yield matches the current rate of inflation; investors can use this dividend to provide a stronger level of protection against the effects of price inflation

    Based on the current dividend yield and the expected price appreciation, the stock has ~45% potential total return profile

    The stock has a trading price of $10.97 and an average price target of $15.20, implying a one-year upside of ~39%

    Proceeds from these properties generated Q2 revenues of $70.5 million, for a 44% year-over-year increase

    These results meant that IIPR’s dividend is affordable – and in fact, management raised the dividend payment in the most recent declaration

    At that yield, it almost matches the rate of inflation

    Shares are trading for $88.09, and their $161.83 average target implies a one-year upside of ~84%

  • CAN MARTINEZ STOP HAALAND FROM SCORING IN MANCHESTER DERBY?

    https://africa.espn.com/football/english-premier-league/story/4756437/can-martinez-stop-haaland-from-scoring-in-manchester-derby

    09/30/2022

    70.27% Shortened!

    Almost 12 months on, Martinez and Haaland will face off against each other again on Sunday when Ten Hag's United travel to the Etihad in the first Manchester derby of the season

    Haaland head-to-head will arguably be the most decisive

    Yet Haaland is proving to be almost unstoppable in a City shirt

    On paper, Haaland vs

    Martinez should be a mismatch

    "Maybe he could go left-back, maybe he could play in a back three, but in a back four, he cannot play there in the Premier League

    He just needs to keep going." Against Dortmund, Martinez and Timber shared the defensive duties while marking Haaland

    But while Sunday will clearly be a test of the Martinez-Varane axis, it will also be a challenge for Haaland, who has yet to face one of the Premier League's so-called Big Six in a competitive fixture this season

    How Haaland fares against United will be an interesting pointer for the months ahead

    Haaland is unquestionably a goal-scoring phenomenon and stopping him will be United's primary objective this weekend

    In Martinez, though, they at least have a defender who knows how to do just that.

    ['city', 'haaland', 'martinez', 'united', 'league']

    Almost 12 months on, Martinez and Haaland will face off against each other again on Sunday when Ten Hag's United travel to the Etihad in the first Manchester derby of the season

    Haaland head-to-head will arguably be the most decisive

    Yet Haaland is proving to be almost unstoppable in a City shirt

    On paper, Haaland vs

    Martinez should be a mismatch

    "Maybe he could go left-back, maybe he could play in a back three, but in a back four, he cannot play there in the Premier League

    He just needs to keep going." Against Dortmund, Martinez and Timber shared the defensive duties while marking Haaland

    But while Sunday will clearly be a test of the Martinez-Varane axis, it will also be a challenge for Haaland, who has yet to face one of the Premier League's so-called Big Six in a competitive fixture this season

    How Haaland fares against United will be an interesting pointer for the months ahead

    Haaland is unquestionably a goal-scoring phenomenon and stopping him will be United's primary objective this weekend

    In Martinez, though, they at least have a defender who knows how to do just that.

    ['city', 'haaland', 'martinez', 'united', 'league']



  • SENATORS ARE FIGHTING TO HELP YOU TO BUY MORE I BONDS SOON

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/senators-fighting-help-buy-more-185434555.html

    57.14% Shortened!

    For more help with planning your retirement, consider working with a financial advisor

    As of right now, you can purchase $10,000 in I bonds digitally each year, plus $5,000 in paper I bonds

    savings bonds - if you buy a $50 bond, you'll actually pay $50 for it

    There are a few loopholes to get around the $10,000 limit

    You can have your spouse purchase up to $10,000 as well, and if you have a business or trust you can also purchase up to $10,000 in the name of that entity

    New I Bond Legislation While I bonds will see the interest rate adjusted as usual in November, an even bigger change may be coming to the security - allowing people to buy more of them annually under certain conditions

    The new legislation - introduced by Sen

    They have a guaranteed interest rate and can last for various lengths of time

    Currently, you can only purchase up to $10,000 in I bonds each year

    Retirement Planning Tips For help with integrating I bonds into your retirement portfolio, consider working with a financial advisor

    Finding a qualified financial advisor doesn't have to be hard

    If you're ready to find an advisor who can help you achieve your financial goals, get started now

    ['bond', 'year', 'retirement', 'financial', 'advisor']

    09/30/2022, 18:35

    42.86% Shortened!

    The 38-year-old man claimed that he was released by his abductors in Klang, a few hours after the incident and immediately lodged a report at the Ampang Jaya Police headquarters

    Ampang Jaya police chief ACP Mohamad Farouk Eshak confirmed receiving the report and said that the man reported that he was walking alone after having a meal at a restaurant in the area when a group of men pulled him into a white Toyota Vellfire

    “Police received the report on the incident at 5.03pm

    Mohamad Farouk said the businessman sustained injuries on his face and feet and had received medical treatment at the Ampang Hospital

  • BRITISH POUND DEBACLE WORSENS ASIA'S WOES

    https://asiatimes.com/2022/09/british-pound-debacle-worsens-asias-woes/

    09/30/2022, 17:03

    86.9% Shortened!

    Then, Thailand led Asia into a regional financial crisis

    Both worry that the yen’s plunge toward 150 to the dollar will shake Japan’s yield curve in globe-rattling ways

    That would force China into the depreciatory fray

    Former Goldman Sachs uber-economist Jim O’Neill worries about a 1997-98 redux thanks to the yen’s 26% decline this year

    In September 1997, I also was in Beijing when Rubin and Summers cajoled Chinese officials not to devalue the yuan

    It was China devaluing the yuan that scared them the most

    The worry was that a weaker yuan might trigger a fresh wave of competitive devaluations not just in developing Asia, but Japan, too

    That is once again a live concern as the yuan blows past 7 to the dollar at a moment when China’s economy is growing at the slowest pace in 30 years

    This week, the People’s Bank of China stepped up its defense of the yuan, cautioning against one-way bets on the currency

    Thanks to the yuan’s downward trajectory, PBOC policy options are increasingly a mystery

    “The PBOC has to control the pace of M2 growth,” Sun says

    ['asia', 'summer', 'say', 'financial', 'official']

  • BLACKROCK SAYS THESE ARE THE BEST SECTORS TO INVEST IN DURING INFLATIONARY TIMES

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/blackrock-jay-jacobs-says-best-153151958.html

    84.29% Shortened!

    Local Bounti Corporation (LOCL) We’ll start with Local Bounti, an interesting company in the agricultural technology sector

    The company’s main point of differentiation is efficiency

    A look at the revenues will show that this company is making a strong start

    Buy) rating on LOCL stock, as well as set a $13 price target

    At current levels, his target implies a one-year gain of a whooping 432%

    The shares are priced at $2.44 and have an average target of $10.20, suggesting an upside of 318% on the one-year horizon

    (See LOCL stock forecast at TipRanks) Clean Energy Fuels (CLNE) We’ll shift now to clean energy

    For the recent 2Q22, the company delivered a total of 50 million gallons, up from 42.9 million gallons in the year-ago quarter

    “As the leading natural gas fuel distributor in North America, CLNE is in a prime position to fuel the transportation sector’s transition to renewable energy

    Buy), and his price target, which he puts at $13, indicates room for some robust 137% growth in the year ahead

    Buy) rating on the shares, which in is view get a $47 price target for a 31% one-year upside potential

  • IS MALAYSIA PREPARED FOR GLOBAL ECONOMIC SHOCK?

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/09/30/is-malaysia-prepared-for-global-economic-shock

    09/30/2022

    72.5% Shortened!

    THERE is a growing chorus sounding global recession alarm bells

    The World Bank has warned that simultaneous global rate hikes in response to inflation could trigger a recession in 2023

    With the risk of a global recession, especially in the United States and Europe being worried about, is Malaysia safer than we were during the Covid-19 pandemic crisis in 2020-2021 and the Global Financial Crisis in 2008-2009? The answer is Malaysia will be manageable but will not be fully insulated from an external economic shock if triggered by a global recession or a severe recession in the US economy and Europe

    Unemployment Domestic labour market has not fully recovered as July’s unemployment rate of 3.7% is still a distance from the pre-pandemic jobless rate of 3.3%

    In addition, skill-related (36.7% in second-quarter 2022 or 2Q22 versus 34.8% in 4Q19) and time-related (1.4% in 2Q22 versus 1.1% in 4Q19) underemployment is still a hindrance to a sustainable economic recovery

    Domestic demand Second is relying on domestic demand (private consumption and private investment), backed by public investment and government-linked investment companies’ investment

    Can the households brace for an economic slowdown? The job market and wage growth will slow

    On businesses, policymakers need to put in place measures to ease the constraints that confront labour market, cost of doing business, regulatory as well as compliance cost, and trade networks

    Both domestic financial and foreign exchange markets would witness persistent volatility arising from the negative spillover effects of the global financial markets if a recession hit major advanced economies

    Bank Negara will have the policy tools to ensure an orderly foreign exchange market and ensure sufficient domestic liquidity (both the ringgit and US dollar) to support the economy

    The monetary policy must be employed consistently to support domestic demand, in a timely manner, and to ensure price stability

    ['global', 'recession', 'economic', 'high', 'rate']

    THERE is a growing chorus sounding global recession alarm bells

    The World Bank has warned that simultaneous global rate hikes in response to inflation could trigger a recession in 2023

    Unemployment Domestic labour market has not fully recovered as July’s unemployment rate of 3.7% is still a distance from the pre-pandemic jobless rate of 3.3%

    In addition, skill-related (36.7% in second-quarter 2022 or 2Q22 versus 34.8% in 4Q19) and time-related (1.4% in 2Q22 versus 1.1% in 4Q19) underemployment is still a hindrance to a sustainable economic recovery

    Domestic demand Second is relying on domestic demand (private consumption and private investment), backed by public investment and government-linked investment companies’ investment

    On businesses, policymakers need to put in place measures to ease the constraints that confront labour market, cost of doing business, regulatory as well as compliance cost, and trade networks

    The monetary policy must be employed consistently to support domestic demand, in a timely manner, and to ensure price stability

    ['global', 'recession', 'economic', 'high', 'rate']

    09/30/2022, 16:05

    45.0% Shortened!

    The son told his mother that his father had been messaging girls on his Instagram account, asking for explicit photos, according to the report

    — Photo by Claudio Schwarz on Unsplash A Utah man has been charged with six counts of attempted sexual exploitation after being accused of using his son’s Instagram to ask for nude photos from minors

    The 39-year-old man’s ex-wife contacted the Brigham City Police Department to report that he had been using her son’s phone to message female teenagers, according to an incident report

    The son left his phone at his father’s home

    McClatchy News is not identifying the father to protect the identity of his son

    The son told his mother that his father had been messaging girls on his Instagram account, asking for explicit photos, according to the report

    On one occasion the man sent a photo of his leg during a conversation, police said

    The man sent a text to a juvenile on May 8, saying, “Your sexy as hell, send send me the sexiest picture you got,” according to the report

    “Let’s see what your working with?? Show me your goods,” the man said in another message, according to police

  • GEELY ACQUIRES 7.6% STAKE IN ASTON MARTIN LAGONDA - PAULTAN.ORG

    https://paultan.org/2022/09/30/geely-acquires-7-6-stake-in-aston-martin-lagonda/

    09/30/2022

    45.0% Shortened!

    In a statement, Geely Holding Group CEO Daniel Donghui Li said that Geely’s well-established track record and technology offerings would be able to contribute to Aston Martin’s future success

    Geely’s inclusion as a shareholder in Aston Martin Lagonda comes three months after Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund (PIF) took a 16.7% stake in the automaker, which has been beset with high debt in recent times

    Another significant shareholder is Mercedes-Benz, which presently has a 9.7% stake in Aston Martin after the capital increase made in July

    It was not disclosed how much representation Geely will have in terms of board seats

    Comments Proton Aston Habesla Britain dah jual to China! Oh wait, Jag & LR dah jual to India, Mini dah jual to Jerman, MG dah jual to China, Lotus & Caterham dah jual to Mesia.

    Habesla Britain no longer British, even their Finance Minister is an incompetent MP from Africa origin! Geely spreading its wings, and yet their own cars are not in significant markets yet

    Wonder why? Western bias of china

    U mean western companies can freely do anything they want in China such as buy Chinese companies? Imperialised, seriously In Todays world ? If it is one needs to look at how china operates

    No doubt Geely is being strategic and good for them in expanding their wings in a free market with level playing field

    120 years ago Britain came to China and conquered them through force.

    Now 120 years later, China came to Britain and conquered them through economics.

    ['aston', 'martin', 'geely', 'september', 'china']

  • REPORT: LIVERPOOL NOW CONSIDERING SIGNING 21-YEAR-OLD ATTACKER AFTER WHAT JURGEN KLOPP’S BEEN TOLD RECENTLY

    https://www.rousingthekop.com/2022/09/30/report-liverpool-now-considering-signing-21-year-old-attacker-after-what-jurgen-klopps-been-told-recently/

    09/30/2022, 16:03

    47.83% Shortened!

    Liverpool are considering signing young Egyptian attacker Ibrahim Adel in January

    90min report that Liverpool scouts were already ‘familiar’ with Adel before Salah’s recommendation, though

    But should Liverpool make a move, Adel would have to be loaned out

    As he wouldn’t be able to come into the first team straight away on account of work permit issues, Adel would be a signing for the future

    At twenty-one, he’s already broken into the Egyptian national team

    As far as comparisons go, it would feel lazy to lump him into the Salah bracket

    In that respect, perhaps a move to Liverpool wouldn’t do Adel much good

    Because he wouldn’t be able to play straight away, this may make it difficult for him to live up to that tag

    The figures involved make it no gamble at all for Liverpool

    If he develops as Salah did, he’ll make a fine player

    If not, Liverpool could still earn a good fee from him as they did with the likes of Taiwo Awoniyi, who never played for the club during a six-year spell

    Like Awoniyi, Adel looks set for a bright future in Europe whether that’s at Liverpool or elsewhere

    ['liverpool', 'egyptian', 'adel', 'salah', 'would']

  • JAPAN'S NIKKEI FALLS 2%; ASIA-PACIFIC MARKETS SLIDE AFTER S&P 500 CLOSES AT NEW YEAR-LOW

    https://www.cnbc.com/2022/09/30/asia-markets-wall-street-china-pmi-stocks-currencies.html

    09/30/2022, 15:05

    80.7% Shortened!

    China's official factory activity data unexpectedly expanded in August, beating estimates

    In Japan, the Nikkei 225 slipped 1.83% to 25,937.21, and the Topix index fell 1.76% to 1,835.94

    Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company fell 2.41% and Largan Precision slumped 4.39%

    The 50-point mark separates growth from contraction

    PMI prints compare activity from month to month

    The official non-manufacturing PMI came in at 50.6 in September, down from 52.6 in August

    — Abigail Ng China's official manufacturing Purchasing Managers' Index for September is expected to come in below the 50-point mark separating growth from contraction, according to a Reuters poll of analysts

    PMI readings are sequential and represent month-on-month expansion or contraction

    — Abigail Ng Industrial production in Japan grew 2.7% in August from July, according to official data, marking the third consecutive month of growth

    The central bank also signaled it may raise interest rates up to as high as 4.6% in 2023 to control inflation

    Data also provided by

    ['index', 'fell', 'inflation', 'month', 'bank']

    Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company fell 2.41% and Largan Precision slumped 4.39%

    The 50-point mark separates growth from contraction

    PMI prints compare activity from month to month

    — Abigail Ng Industrial production in Japan grew 2.7% in August from July, according to official data, marking the third consecutive month of growth

    The central bank also signaled it may raise interest rates up to as high as 4.6% in 2023 to control inflation
